local_intent: Perceive the white_plate, move above it to 0.05m, perform fine approach and verify arrival.
assumptions: Camera can confirm white_plate (or DetectObject will succeed)
ComputeGraspPose has been run earlier and wp_grasp is available for downstream pick
Robot homed and can reach the specified above pose
coherence_with_global: Matches the GLOBAL_BT approach phase: follows detection, executes MoveAbove (active leaf) and then ApproachAndAlign before pick.
